Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_brazx3uq&referenceId=1_brazx3uq&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: U.S. stock index futures fell as Facebook-owner Meta Platforms' disappointing forecast triggered a slump in other technology companies. Amazon is expected to show a fall in Q4 profit. Ford's quarterly sales are expected to rise. Plus, Eli Lilly is seen reporting a close to 4% rise in sales.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3okUWsb
